message: not coding yet though
oh lol np
so maybe I don't deserve to be here yet...
right now our infrastructure is holding... so that's not an issue *right* now
I'm not sure if simple markup counts as coding, but I've been at it for an hour.  Moving on to cup 2 of coffee.
As I see it, you guys want to make it a place for everybody.. right?
I believe thinking about how to code something should qualify. It leads directly to coding.
okay, I've definitely been doing that
@leah With all the feedback and everything, how do you guys manage to decide on what you should focus/code next?
@pheze right now we're working on user growth, so we prioritize things that will help us grow
@leah Do you mean scaling or better way to attract new users?
to a lesser extent we're working on user retention so features that keep people happy are important too
@pheze I meant new users, sorry
sorry if I don't make much sense at 6am :D
oh, it's 9h here
I guess I'm cheating a little bit to be in this group, but then, I was coding since a long time
@pheze yep! we hope there's something for everyone
Still, you've found a great place for developers to hang as IRC is kind of hard to follow if you're not there all the time + Topics make it easier to have branch conversations.
@pheze I'm glad you like it so far!
@leah I find it has really good timing.. as I was trying to develop my product on IRC, but everyone else didn't want to because it was too geek
so, convore = irc 2.0
extra points for sunday
I haven't slept, it's still pretty soon in the morning. So, am I not an early bird?
@pheze I never really did much work in ruby
oh, and @leah, question from a friend, he says you've got a ruby (lucky stiff) tattoo, so he's asking why you switched to python
completely opposite
i just woke up 30 minutes ago
I accept your challenge sir
/me making more coffee
ha
monday will be awesome
Just saying.. Late night crew and Early bird are pretty the same, no?
you have a _why tattoo?
no, its still 'last night' for you
and I like why's philosophy on programming... more than a particular language
yeah, not the same at all
ok, so that is the difference
if you can stay awake longer than me, then it counts :)
me and monday aren't friend anyway
@leah the coding is fun philosophy?
I wonder if this channel defeats the purpose. Don't most of us code early to avoid distraction?  :)
I code early because I'm smarter then
agree with @spaut for coding when distractions are lower
Good morning gang!  I code early because I work on the east coast for a silicon valley company - which means I get to code until about noon EST before all my meetings start.  *shares coffee*
Mornin' :)
Morning, 5:30 here CST
Good morning! 6:40 here.  Walking the dogs, one more cup of coffee and then time to code.
Been awhile. Good mornin' everyone
hello :-) everyone!
@leah Saw you on TWiT! Well done! And I must say I am very impressed with what you guys/gals have created! Any chance for a Danish translation of the site? Or a way one can help with translations??
